lyrics:
Greek
Greek script
Translation



Greek
Perase ki alli mera choris skopo
Adeies oi ores moni ston kosmo afto
Mesa stin kamara mou, skyfti xana
Monadiki chara, na thymamai ta palia
Teleioses san tragoudi melodiko
Isoun ena mikro kommati mousiko
Emeine t’ aroma sou san nota sto charti
Sfragida zontani stigmis erotikis
S’ agapousa, sti zoi mou se kratousa
Echeis fygei kai me pnigei i monaxia
Na se kleiso stin kardia mou lachtarousa
Ma itan lathos, to katalava arga
Panta tha se thymamai sa mia giorti
Eikona agapimeni, pantotini
Anamnisi glykia pou den tha sviseis
Elpida mystiki pos tha gyriseis
S’ agapousa, sti zoi mou se kratousa
Echeis fygei kai me pnigei i monaxia
Na se kleiso stin kardia mou lachtarousa
Ma itan lathos, to katalava arga
Na se kleiso stin kardia mou lachtarousa
Ma itan lathos, to katalava arga
